lstDialogOne: We have come here today sir..
To make one last request on behalf of the scientific community.
Whatever money is left in the treasury, before the Kingdom collapses-
Donate the treasury to science and help fight cancer
You can help save others who suffer from the tragedy that possesses you.
I'm sorry you can't be saved
But please think of what we could do with that money
lstOutcomeNoText: A sad day for cancer sufferers..
